title: WE BELIEVE IN IMAGINATION
description: 1,334 people’s have teamed up with us to make their imaginations come true

title: THE DARK ART
description: Dark art is one of the illustration genres that is often associated with images of chaos, horror, gothic, metaphysical, nightmares and is even considered very close to surrealism. At Artmazigh studio, we have special illustrators who are very competent in drawing this genre.

title: REBEL ILLUSTRATION
description: The rebel genre illustration is made by prioritizing stroke details, compositions, and colors. The aim is to make the illustrations represent the energy from the ideas and crazy imaginations of the imaginators (clients) accurately

title: TRADITIONAL TATTOO
description: Traditional tattoo design usually depicts and emphasizes the traditional or legend stories from specific places or ethnic groups. Artmazigh is always try the best to learn the story behind the concept to make the design as close as the original stories and details. We keep it simple yet detailed
